sentences.en: For a combatant of the Battle of 73 Easting, simulations came as a trinity.
sentences.cn: 对于参加了东73公里处战役的战斗人员来说, 所谓模拟其实是一种三位一体的东西.

sentences.en: I have never suggested that U.N. forces could physically separate the combatants in the region.
sentences.cn: 我从未表示过联合国部队能将该地区的参战者们实际隔离开。

sentences.en: In the combatant grade the swords were positioned between the arms of the Cross pointing upward.
sentences.cn: 在战斗成绩剑被安置了在十字架的胳膊之间指向上.

sentences.en: Positively seeking, grasping and creating combatant chance is a must.
sentences.cn: 必须积极寻找 、 把握和创造战机.

sentences.en: The cost engineer is the fresh combatant of Chinese project cost management.
sentences.cn: [中英文摘要]造价工程师是我国造价工程管理工作的生力军.

sentences.en: The enemy combatant was delivered to the agents.
sentences.cn: 敌方战斗人员被交给了特工们.

sentences.en: The General does not like non-combatant personnel near a scene of action.
sentences.cn: 将军不喜欢非战斗部队人员靠近战场。

sentences.en: The line between the combatant and non - combatant ship, already indistinct, had almost vanished.
sentences.cn: 战斗舰与 非 战斗舰之间的那种本来已经不十分明显的界线, 这时几乎已不存在了.

sentences.en: They come from the combatant nations.

trans.tran_cn: 斗士，战士，争斗者，[体]队员
trans.tran_en: someone who fights in a war
